hackathon-description-text: Devils Invent is a series of weekend-long design events where we encourage ASU students to design, build, and implement innovative solutions to challenging problem statements submitted by community and industry partners. The hackathons are thematically focused, centered around topics pertinent to the challenges that will be faced by engineers as they go out into the world, including topics such as: Reuse and Sustainability, Healthcare Delivery, Internet of Things, Education, and Community Development.
hackathon-rules: Be sure to checkin on Friday night between 11:45am
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=G Wing, 501 E Tyler Mall, Tempe, AZ 85281, USA
hackathon-location-address: G Wing, 501 E Tyler Mall, Tempe, AZ 85281, USA
hackathon-description-header: Come delve into the world of internet of things (even if you are new to the field)!
